body_html: @jlowin Thank you!! This would have never ocurred to me. I tried emb.set_shape([maxLength, batchSize, embDimSize]) but I got an error saying I cannot use 'Tensor' in the set_shape argument. Then I gave up hope. Thank you very much again!!
body_text: @jlowin Thank you!! This would have never ocurred to me. I tried emb.set_shape([maxLength, batchSize, embDimSize]) but I got an error saying I cannot use 'Tensor' in the set_shape argument. Then I gave up hope. Thank you very much again!!
body: @jlowin Thank you!! This would have never ocurred to me. I tried `emb.set_shape([maxLength, batchSize, embDimSize])` but I got an error saying I cannot use 'Tensor' in the `set_shape` argument. Then I gave up hope. Thank you very much again!!
